org.pepstock.charba.client.datalabels.callbacks

Interface FormatterCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PercentageCallback

    public interface FormatterCallback
    Callback interface of DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin to set formatter property at runtime, using the plugin context.
    Labels can be displayed on multiple lines by using the newline character \n between each line or by providing an array of strings where each item represents a new line.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String invoke(DataLabelsContext context, DataItem dataItem)
      Returns the formatted label value.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        String invoke(DataLabelsContext context,
              DataItem dataItem)
        Returns the formatted label value.
        Parameters:
        context - DataLabelsPlugin.ID plugin context instance
        dataItem - value container to be formatted.
        Can be a simple double, String or a FloatingData.
        Returns:
        the label value to be showed
